thread.title: Marina Abramovic previews virtual reality artwork

title: Marina Abramovic previews virtual reality artwork
text:
Marina Abramovic previews virtual reality artwork 12:07pm GMT - 02:09 
World renowned artists, sculptor Anish Kapoor and performance artist Marina Abramovic, have created Virtual Reality artworks for the first time. Jayson Mansaray reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
World renowned artists, sculptor Anish Kapoor and performance artist Marina Abramovic, have created Virtual Reality artworks for the first time. Jayson Mansaray reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Id8qj4
